casebody.data:
LAN TU TRINH, Petitioner
v.
Kathleen Lien TRINH a/k/a Lien Bich Trinh and LT International Beauty School, Inc., Respondents No. 542 EAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. May 14, 2019

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 14th day of May, 2019, the Application Seeking Leave to Respond to Opposition to Petition for Allowance of Appeal and the Petition for Allowance of Appeal are DENIED.
